short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insight into the creditworthiness of your relationships with the GraydonCreditsafe for Exact Online powered by Solid Online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GraydonCreditsafe checks, confirms, and enriches business data with information from various sources. This enables GraydonCreditsafe to generate valuable insights into economic, financial, and commercial aspects, allowing you to make better business decisions.
 
Data is retrieved and supplemented to support the entire prospect-to-cash process. This includes information about potential customers, clients, and contacts. Added data includes risk assessments (such as credit limits, payment scores, and the likelihood of bankruptcy), company profiles and group relationships, contact information, and signing authority.
 
With this extension, you enrich customer data from Exact Online with information from the GraydonCreditsafe database. Additionally, it is possible to request a credit report with just one click, which is then stored directly in the customer dossier. This integration is powered by Solid Online.
 
Stay informed about the current creditworthiness of your relationships!
